item.title: 美国银行调查显示，地缘政治紧张局势是美国信贷投资者最关心的问题
item.description: 根据博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）的一项最新调查，地缘政治风险成为美国企业信贷投资者最关注的问题。【原文：Geopolitical risk topped the list of concerns among U.S. corporate credit investors, according to a new survey by BofA Global Research.】

item.title: 备忘录：波音预计 787 生产率和交付量增长放缓
item.description: 波音公司一位负责787喷气机项目的高管周一告诉工人们，该公司预计787喷气机的生产和交付速度将放缓，因为这家美国飞机制造商正在与 "几个关键部件 "的供应商短缺作斗争。【原文：Boeing said it expects a slower increase in its 787 jet rate of production and deliveries, as the U.S. planemaker wrestles with supplier shortages "on a few key parts," an executive on the program told workers on Monday.】

item.title: 拉美航空在巴西航空市场的份额创 11 年新高，Gol 航空下滑
item.description: 当地航空监管机构 ANAC 周一公布的数据显示，拉美航空 3 月份在巴西国内市场的份额达到了 11 年来的最高水平，而竞争对手 Gol 在申请破产后继续徘徊不前。【原文：LATAM Airlines' share of Brazil's domestic market reached its highest level in 11 years in March, data from local aviation regulator ANAC showed on Monday, while rival Gol continued to falter after filing for bankruptcy.】

item.title: 迪斯尼公司的 Aaron LaBerge 将卸任，加入宾夕法尼亚娱乐公司担任首席技术官
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，迪斯尼娱乐和 ESPN 首席技术官亚伦-拉伯格（Aaron LaBerge）将卸任，加入游戏和体育媒体公司宾夕法尼亚娱乐公司（Penn Entertainment）。【原文：Disney Entertainment and ESPN Chief Technology Officer Aaron LaBerge would step down from the position and join gaming and sports media firm Penn Entertainment , according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 增长和产品战略存疑，特斯拉利润率有望下降
item.description: 在经历了包括大规模裁员、汽车降价以及投资者紧急呼吁明确产品战略在内的混乱一周之后，特斯拉预计将于周二公布六年多来毛利率最低的财报。【原文：Tesla is expected to report its lowest gross profit margin in more than six years on Tuesday after a chaotic week that included major layoffs, vehicle price cuts and urgent calls by investors for clarity on product strategy.】

item.title: Vanguard 建议在投资组合中增加通胀保护措施
item.description: Vanguard 一位高管周一表示，鉴于近期数据显示美国物价压力不断上升，在投资组合中增加通胀保护是值得的。【原文：A Vanguard executive said on Monday increasing inflation protection in investment portfolios was worthwhile in light of recent data showing rising U.S. price pressures.】

item.title: ELFA 称，3 月份美国商业设备借款下降 7
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周一称，与一年前相比，3月份美国公司的设备投资融资借款减少了7%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 7% less to finance equipment investments in March compared to a year ago, industry body Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Monday.】

item.title: 阿根廷 2 月经济活动骤降 6
item.description: 路透社周一对市场分析师进行的一项调查显示，阿根廷2月份的经济活动可能同比下滑5.9%，这将是在新任自由主义总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）采取严厉紧缩措施的情况下连续第四个月下滑。【原文：Argentina's economic activity likely plunged 5.9% year-on-year in February, a Reuters poll of market analysts showed on Monday, which would make a fourth straight monthly slide amid tough austerity measures under new libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 独家报道激进分子 Jana 在信中敦促 Wolfspeed 考虑出售或其他战略选择
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的一封信，激进投资者 Jana Partners 正敦促全球最大的碳化硅制造商 Wolfspeed 公司探索提高股东价值的所有途径，包括潜在的出售。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners is urging the world's largest maker of silicon carbide Wolfspeed Inc to explore all ways to improve shareholder value, including a potential sale, according to a letter reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 电动汽车推广面临挫折，欧盟 2050 年零排放目标岌岌可危
item.description: 欧盟外聘审计员表示，欧盟需要重新考虑其政策，使 2035 年禁止销售新汽油车成为可行，因为电动汽车（EV）仍然负担不起，替代燃料选择也不可信，这将危及欧盟 2050 年的气候目标。【原文：The EU needs to rethink its policies to make a 2035 ban on new petrol car sales feasible as electric vehicles (EVs) remain unaffordable and alternative fuel options are not credible, the EU's external auditor said, jeopardising its 2050 climate goals.】

item.title: 独家报道石油制裁卷土重来，委内瑞拉加速加密货币转型
item.description: 委内瑞拉国营石油公司 PDVSA 的三位知情人士称，由于美国重新对该国实施石油制裁，该公司计划在原油和燃料出口中增加数字货币的使用。【原文：Venezuela's state-run oil company PDVSA plans to increase digital currency usage in its crude and fuel exports as the U.S. reimposes oil sanctions on the country, three people familiar with the plan said.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，苹果公司即将与国际足联敲定新赛事电视转播权协议
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周一报道，足球管理机构国际足联（FIFA）即将与苹果公司达成协议，将一项新的大型赛事的全球电视转播权授予这家科技公司。【原文：Soccer's governing body FIFA is close to establishing a deal with Apple to give the tech company worldwide television rights for a major new tournament, the New York Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 前捷蓝航空首席执行官海斯将领导空中客车北美公司
item.description: 前捷蓝航空公司首席执行官罗宾-海斯（Robin Hayes）被任命为空中客车公司北美业务的新负责人。【原文：Former JetBlue Airways CEO Robin Hayes has been named as the new head of Airbus' operations in North America, the European planemaker said Monday.】

item.title: Meta 向第三方设备制造商开放 Quest 操作系统
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周一表示，支持 Meta Quest 头戴式设备的操作系统现在可以被第三方硬件制造商使用。【原文：The operating system that powers Meta Quest headsets can now be used by third-party hardware makers, Meta Platforms said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将强制要求包机航空公司和制造商使用安全工具
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）周一表示，它正在最后敲定新规定，要求包机、通勤、航空旅游运营商和飞机制造商实施一项旨在减少事故的关键安全工具。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) on Monday said it is finalizing new rules requiring charter, commuter, air tour operators, and aircraft manufacturers to implement a key safety tool aimed at reducing accidents.】

item.title: 美联储鹰派和鸽派：美国央行行长认为 "不急于 "减息
item.description: 长期以来，央行观察人士一直用 "鸽派 "和 "鹰派 "这两个标签来描述决策者的货币政策倾向，鸽派更关注劳动力市场的风险，而鹰派则更关注通货膨胀的威胁。【原文：The labels "dove" and "hawk" have long been used by central bank watchers to describe the monetary policy leanings of policymakers, with a dove more focused on risks to the labor market and a hawk more focused on the threat of inflation.】

item.title: HFR 表示，第一季度对冲基金资产达 4.3 万亿美元
item.description: 数据提供商 HFR 周一表示，全球对冲基金行业在第一季度末的资产规模达到 4.3 万亿美元，创下历史新高。【原文：The global hedge fund industry ended the first quarter with $4.3 trillion in assets, a record level, data provider HFR said on Monday.】

item.title: 比特币交易商摆脱 "减半 "影响，关注更广泛的市场风险
item.description: 到目前为止，比特币所谓的减半事件对其价格影响甚微，业内人士周一表示，加密货币的命运与更广泛的金融市场情绪和地缘政治关系更为密切。【原文：Bitcoin's so-called halving event has had little impact on its price so far, with industry insiders on Monday saying the cryptocurrency's fortunes were more closely tied to broader financial market sentiment and geopolitics.】

item.title: 阿联酋人工智能公司 G42 宣布与美国高通公司合作
item.description: 总部位于阿拉伯联合酋长国的人工智能公司 G42 在一份声明中表示，该公司已与美国高通公司达成合作协议，其子公司 Core42 将在其 Condor AI 平台中采用高通公司的 Cloud AI 100 产品。【原文：United Arab Emirates-based artificial intelligence firm G42 said it had agreed a collaboration with U.S. group Qualcomm under which its subsidiary Core42 would feature Qualcomm's Cloud AI 100 products in its Condor AI platform, a G42 statement said.】

item.title: 黑天鹅对冲基金称美联储降息将是市场崩溃的信号
item.description: 在美国金融市场争论降息时机的同时，一家尾部风险对冲基金警告说，投资者应趁近期经济乐观情绪还在持续的时候充分利用它，因为利率下调将预示着市场的急剧崩溃。【原文：While U.S. financial markets debate the timing of interest rate cuts, one tail-risk hedge fund is warning that investors should make the most of recent economic optimism while it lasts, as a shift to lower rates will signal a dramatic market crash.】

item.title: 卖空者从大型科技股大跌中获利，创下单周盈利纪录
item.description: Ortex 的数据显示，上周对美国大型科技股 "华丽七雄 "进行对赌的交易商们创下了有史以来最大的单周盈利纪录，盈利超过 100 亿美元，其中最大的收益来自于对英伟达（Nvidia）和特斯拉（Tesla）股票的空头头寸。【原文：Traders who bet against the "Magnificent 7" group of big U.S. tech stocks booked their biggest-ever weekly profit of more than $10 billion last week, with the biggest gains coming from their short position in shares of Nvidia and Tesla, Ortex data showed.】

item.title: 价格下跌、成本高企可能影响铜矿企业的季度业绩
item.description: 由于成本居高不下，红色金属价格下跌，北美铜矿商预计本周将公布第一季度盈利下降报告。【原文：North American copper miners are expected to report a decline in first-quarter earnings this week due to lower prices of the red metal amid persistently high costs.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回旺达制药公司关于睡眠药物专利的诉讼案
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理旺达制药公司（Vanda Pharmaceuticals）要求恢复其睡眠障碍药物 Hetlioz 专利的申请，该专利此前在与仿制药生产商 Teva 和 Apotex 的纠纷中被宣布无效。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to hear a bid by Vanda Pharmaceuticals to revive patents for its sleep-disorder drug Hetlioz that were previously declared invalid in a dispute with generic drugmakers Teva and Apotex.】

item.title: 花旗集团董事总经理在诉讼中详述 "无处不在 "的性骚扰行为
item.description: 根据花旗集团周一提交的一份修订法律文件，花旗集团的一名董事总经理称，由于该行 "普遍存在 "性骚扰和性别歧视文化，该行未能保护她免受一名主管的暴力威胁和虐待。【原文：A Citigroup managing director said the bank failed to protect her from a supervisor's violent threats and abuse because of its "pervasive" culture of sexual harassment and gender discrimination, according to an amended legal filing on Monday.】

item.title: 汽车供应商 Adient 在欧洲裁员并转移岗位以降低成本
item.description: 汽车座椅供应商阿迪恩特公司（Adient plc）周一表示，公司正在重组欧洲业务，裁员并将工作转移到劳动力成本较低的国家，以降低成本。【原文：Automotive seating supplier Adient plc on Monday said it was restructuring its Europe business by cutting jobs and transferring work to countries with lower labor expenses, in a bid to cut costs.】

item.title: 波音公司将面临有关潜在首席执行官候选人和 Spirit 谈判的问题
item.description: 波音公司将于本周三公布其业绩，包括潜在的首席执行官候选人、与 Spirit AeroSystems 的谈判以及下滑的 737 MAX 喷气机产量，而其季度报告预计将显示现金消耗率激增。【原文：Tough questions await Boeing when it announces its results on Wednesday, including on potential CEO candidates, talks with Spirit AeroSystems and slumping 737 MAX jet output, while its quarterly report is expected to show a surge in cash-burn rate.】

item.title: 瑞银称，六大科技公司的盈利势头将在 2024 年 "崩溃
item.description: 瑞银全球研究公司（UBS Global Research）的策略师周一表示，所谓的六大科技股的利润增长势头可能在未来几个季度 "崩溃"，并下调了对这些超大市值公司的评级。【原文：Profit growth momentum of the so-called Big Six technology stocks could "collapse" over the next few quarters, UBS Global Research strategists said on Monday, downgrading its rating on the mega-cap companies.】

item.title: 博通的批评者拒绝接受其云计算许可变更
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom）的批评者周一拒绝了这家美国芯片制造商对其云计算许可做法的修改，称这些修改并没有解决他们对涉嫌涨价、不公平的软件许可条款和捆绑产品的投诉。【原文：Broadcom's critics on Monday rejected the U.S. chipmaker's changes to its cloud licensing practices, saying they do not address their complaints about alleged price hikes, unfair software licensing terms and tying products together.】

item.title: 克罗格和 Albertsons 修订与 C&S Wholesale 的资产出售协议
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger）和阿尔伯森公司（Albertsons Cos）周一表示，他们已经修订了与 C&S Wholesale Grocers 公司就出售资产达成的最终协议，以配合他们的合并提议。【原文：Kroger and Albertsons Cos said on Monday that they have amended their definitive agreement with C&S Wholesale Grocers for the sale of assets in connection with their proposed merger.】

item.title: 美国旅游业面临漫长等待 中国旅游业将创 2019 年新高
item.description: 由于中国旅游业增长缓慢和成本高昂，使得游客远离美国，因此美国旅游业至少还需要等待两年，才能使利润丰厚的中国旅游业恢复到大流行前的水平。【原文：The U.S. travel sector will have to wait at least two more years for lucrative Chinese tourism to recover to pre-pandemic levels as slow growth and high costs in the Asian country keep its tourists away from America.】
